body: From Julia (CAO) - 8:06 AM Audit Follow-up: 19 PRs open, ALL zero reviews, 4 CONFLICTING. Safe to merge now per authority matrix: #70, #52, #53, #51. Needs Codex sweep first: #43, #44.
